news.title: KNEECAP banned from advertising on London Tube
news.summary: "How petty can political policing and interference get," KNEECAP wrote.

news.title: New book about the final years of legendary singer John Prine announced
news.summary: The book follows the last years of one of the most celebrated songwriters.

news.title: Bob Dylan announces run of Belfast, Killarney and Dublin shows
news.summary: Tickets for the Irish shows go on sale next week.

news.title: New art print inspired by Izz Café owners to raise funds for World Central Kitchen's work in Gaza
news.summary: All profits will be donated to World Central Kitchen to help their efforts in Gaza.

news.title: GAA Palestine to appeal Irish visa denial ahead of summer tour
news.summary: "If the Palestinians have taught us anything, this was the beginning of a dream and we will not let this stop us."

news.title: Netflix release trailer for Wednesday season 2 - filmed in Ireland

news.summary: The song is originally from their 1994 debut album Definitely Maybe, written by lead guitarist Noel Gallagher.

news.summary: Additional names are expected to be announced in the lead-up to the event.

news.title: Blondie episode of Hot Press Classics out now
news.summary: Paul Nolan and Stuart Clark are gonna get ya one way or another, as they revisit Blondie’s 1978 classic Parallel Lines.
